mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, dept_id, email, mobile, status, create_time, modify_time, lassystem_login_time, ssex, is_tab, theme, avatar, description
mapper.select: select su.user_id, su.username, su.password, su.dept_id, su.email, su.mobile, su.status, su.create_time, su.modify_time, su.last_login_time, su.gender, su.is_tab, su.theme, su.avatar, su.description, group_concat(distinct sur.role_id) roleIds, group_concat(distinct sr.role_name) roleNames, group_concat(distinct sudp.dept_id) deptIds from system_user su left join system_user_role sur on su.user_id = sur.user_id inner join system_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id left join system_user_data_permission sudp on su.user_id = sudp.user_id WHERE su.username = #{username} group by su.user_id, su.username, su.password, su.dept_id, su.email, su.mobile, su.status, su.create_time, su.modify_time, su.last_login_time, su.gender, su.is_tab, su.theme, su.avatar, su.description
